### encodeCounter() {#abfaf2220ba561ed163a999bafa256178}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned encodeCounter (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression">CounterExpression</a> &gt; Expressions, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> C)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Encode the counter.

The encoding uses the following format: Low 2 bits - Tag: <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca67a8514f4af2332820b159b681e49b1a">Counter::Zero(0)</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> with kind <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca67a8514f4af2332820b159b681e49b1a">Counter::Zero</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca4d833352a08a316752f999f56e6bf06e">Counter::CounterValueReference(1)</a> - A counter with kind <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca4d833352a08a316752f999f56e6bf06e">Counter::CounterValueReference</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca3414aa40642d6bfd511e941d82ed1780">Counter::Expression(2)</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression/#ae5156429537263d93d5d165c7501e49cad1416de918b7a5b4457401a093632670">CounterExpression::Subtract(0)</a> - <Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Encode the counter.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The encoding uses the following format:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Low 2 bits - Tag:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Counter::Zero(0) - A Counter with kind Counter::Zero</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Counter::CounterValueReference(1) - A counter with kind</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">///     Counter::CounterValueReference</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Counter::Expression(2) + CounterExpression::Subtract(0) -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">///     A counter with kind Counter::Expression and an expression</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">///     with kind CounterExpression::Subtract</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Counter::Expression(2) + CounterExpression::Add(1) -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">///     A counter with kind Counter::Expression and an expression</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">///     with kind CounterExpression::Add</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remaining bits - Counter/Expression ID.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137" lineLink="#abfaf2220ba561ed163a999bafa256178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#abfaf2220ba561ed163a999bafa256178">encodeCounter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CounterExpression&gt;</a> Expressions,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">                              <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Tag = unsigned(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getKind());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isExpression())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    Tag += Expressions&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getExpressionID()&#93;.Kind;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> &lt;=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">         (std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max() &gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a195beefec055a20e88e7fade73e9c32f">Counter::EncodingTagBits</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Tag | (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a195beefec055a20e88e7fade73e9c32f">Counter::EncodingTagBits</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that we don&#39;t have any bogus regions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(MappingRegions,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Source region does not begin before it ends&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sort the regions in an ascending order by the file id and the starting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// location. Sort by region kinds to ensure stable order for tests.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(MappingRegions, &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion">CounterMappingRegion</a> &amp;LHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion">CounterMappingRegion</a> &amp;RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHS.FileID &lt; RHS.FileID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.startLoc() != RHS.startLoc())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHS.startLoc() &lt; RHS.startLoc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Put &#96;Decision&#96; before &#96;Expansion&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
